name: @fire/pocketsmith-api
author: Serge Krstic
description: A Typescript wrapper around PocketSmith's REST API.

scripts.generate:api: rm -rf src/generated-api; openapi-generator generate -i ./src/config/pocketsmith.openapi.json -g typescript-axios -o src/generated-api --skip-validate-spec --additional-properties=useSingleRequestParameter=true,withoutPrefixEnums=true,enumNameSuffix=,withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,apiPackage=server,modelPackage=model --openapi-normalizer REFACTOR_ALLOF_WITH_PROPERTIES_ONLY=true
